==========
urlpathlib
==========

This module offers classes representing paths with semantics appropriate for
local and remote resources.

Install
=======

Simply run the following command::

  pip install urlpathlib


Features
========

Supported protocols:

+---------------------------------------+--------------------+----------+
| protocol                              | scheme             | support  |
+=======================================+====================+==========+
| local filesystem                      | file://            | **✓**    |
+---------------------------------------+--------------------+----------+
| HTTP                                  | http://            | **✓**    |
+---------------------------------------+--------------------+----------+

Supported IO operations:

+--------------------------+------------+------------+
| method name              | file://    | http[s]:// |
+==========================+============+============+
| chmod                    | **✓**      |            |
+--------------------------+------------+------------+
| exists                   | **✓**      | **✓**      |
+--------------------------+------------+------------+
| expanduser               | **✓**      |            |
+--------------------------+------------+------------+
| glob                     | **✓**      |            |
+--------------------------+------------+------------+
| group                    | **✓**      |            |
+--------------------------+------------+------------+
| is_block_device          | **✓**      |            |
+--------------------------+------------+------------+
| is_char_device           | **✓**      |            |
+--------------------------+------------+------------+
| is_dir                   | **✓**      |            |
+--------------------------+------------+------------+
| is_fifo                  | **✓**      |            |
+--------------------------+------------+------------+
| is_file                  | **✓**      |            |
+--------------------------+------------+------------+
| is_socket                | **✓**      |            |
+--------------------------+------------+------------+
| is_symlink               | **✓**      |            |
+--------------------------+------------+------------+
| iterdir                  | **✓**      | **✓**¹     |
+--------------------------+------------+------------+
| lchmod                   | **✓**      |            |
+--------------------------+------------+------------+
| lstat                    | **✓**      |            |
+--------------------------+------------+------------+
| mkdir                    | **✓**      |            |
+--------------------------+------------+------------+
| open                     | **✓**      | **✓**      |
+--------------------------+------------+------------+
| read_bytes               | **✓**      |            |
+--------------------------+------------+------------+
| read_text                | **✓**      |            |
+--------------------------+------------+------------+
| rename                   | **✓**      |            |
+--------------------------+------------+------------+
| replace                  | **✓**      |            |
+--------------------------+------------+------------+
| resolve                  | **✓**      |            |
+--------------------------+------------+------------+
| rglob                    | **✓**      |            |
+--------------------------+------------+------------+
| rmdir                    | **✓**      |            |
+--------------------------+------------+------------+
| samefile                 | **✓**      |            |
+--------------------------+------------+------------+
| stat                     | **✓**      |            |
+--------------------------+------------+------------+
| symlink_to               | **✓**      |            |
+--------------------------+------------+------------+
| touch                    | **✓**      |            |
+--------------------------+------------+------------+
| unlink                   | **✓**      |            |
+--------------------------+------------+------------+
| write_bytes              | **✓**      |            |
+--------------------------+------------+------------+
| write_text               | **✓**      |            |
+--------------------------+------------+------------+

Notes:

¹: only binary read is supported at the moment.
